death-of-a-loved-one.title: Death of a loved one
death-of-a-loved-one.summary: If you have lost a loved one, you may qualify for help, including assistance with burial or funeral costs, financial support, and more.
death-of-a-loved-one.secondaryHeadline: Benefits After Losing a Loved One
death-of-a-loved-one.eligibilityCriteria: This page will help you find potential Federal benefits during this life experience. Select the options that best describe your (the applicantâ€™s) situation. A personalized list will show the benefits you may be eligible for.
